title.rendered: NEWTECONS WAS HONORED AS “BEST COMPANY TO WORK FOR IN ASIA IN 2022”

content.rendered:
On August 11, 2022, Newtecons was honored by HR Asia Magazine as one of the Best Companies to Work for in Asia in 2022. Newtecons is thrilled to win this award for the third year in a row.

HR Asia – Best Companies to Work for in Asia is an awards program held annually to recognize and honor businesses with outstanding working environments in Asia. With more than 400,000 annual surveys to measure employee engagement with the workplace, the award is available in 15 markets across the region.

The list of winners this year was carefully considered and chosen using the TEAM (Total Engagement Assessment Model) based on a set of criteria including: Core, Self, and Group applied to significant Vietnamese human resource in Asia labor market.

Newtecons is honored to receive the Best Companies to Work for in Asia Award in 2022

This is Newtecons’ third consecutive year winning in this category; the first two were in 2020 and 2021.

In its 19 years of existence, Newtecons has worked to solidify its position as the top General contractor in Vietnam by leveraging goodwill and prestige to draw in highly skilled workers who will provide the best advantages to clients, and partners and contribute to social development. Five core values which Newtecons builds its company culture: Integrity, Solidarity, Kindness, Optimization, and Creativity. In addition, Newtecons cultivates a work atmosphere that adheres to the following values: Openness, Justice, Cooperation, Sincerity, Youth, Enthusiasm, and Professionalism.

Mr. Luke M.Peereboom – Senior Advisor of Newtecons said: “The recognition is a testament to Newtecons’ efforts to connect with its employees and provide them with attractive compensation and a positive working environment. The recognition is also Newtecons’ commitment to advancing welfare practices and turning the company into a real second home where staff members always feel safe, and we can grow together.”
